item.title: ABC Reporter Pretends Trump Wasn’t Shot While Accepting Award For Assassination Attempt Coverage
item.description: Does the propaganda press want us to forget Trump was shot and that there are still unanswered questions?

item.title: Getting Rid Of Food Dyes Is Good, But Healthy Eating Is Ultimately Up To Us
item.description: Fewer artificial dyes is great, but if Americans want to make their country healthy again, they can’t wait for the government to save them.
